have been host with airbnb since it introduction into the nyc market early 2009 since then ive made commitment to share my homesanctuarycity with nonpretentious open approach above all my space are clean comfortable and convenient with an eclectic mix of vintage and modern little touch of nature and infused with curated piece from around the world they are reflection of my interest travel and passion so if youre planning trip to brooklyn and want to be hosted by nativenew yorker who ha made it her business to provide place that will make you feel like you are home away from home shoot me an email look forward to sharing house on henry casa barcelona and henry local cafe with you
